itemDescription: Northern Irish evangelist and charity executive

wikipedia_page.main: Mark Kenneth Russell (born 25 June 1974) is a charity executive. Since 2019, he has served as the Chief Executive of The Children's Society. He has additionally served as a lay member of the General Synod of the Church of England and of the Archbishops' Council, both from 2005 to 2011 and from 2015 to 2019. He was previously a local preacher in the Methodist Church in Ireland, and is now a reader in the Church of England.

response: Mark Russell (born 1932) is an American political satirist and comedian.
Mark Russell may also refer to:
* Mark Russell (Australian footballer) (born 1962), Australian footballer for Sydney
* Mark Russell (charity director) (born 1974), Northern Irish evangelist and charity executive
